snippet: Investors seem reluctant to put their trust in the long-term bonds of many euro zone governments.
abstract: Investors seem reluctant to put their trust in the long-term bonds of many euro zone governments; euro zone crisis and chronic economic problems may soon erode the credit scores of big countries like France, Italy and Spain.
lead_paragraph: Investors seem reluctant to put their trust in the long-term bonds of many euro zone governments.

headline.main: After Brief Calm, Europe Again Worries Over Debt
headline.print_headline: After Brief Calm, Europe Again Worries Over Debt
